p: The ongoing outbreak of the SARS-CoV2 raised again the problem of suitable treatments against dangerous viral infections and of appropriate care. Despite advances in immunization and drug development, at present, there are no effective preventive vaccine or efficient antiviral therapies to treat coronavirus infection diseases and to limit the main cause of death ( Sanders, Monogue, Jodlowski, & Cutrell, 2020). Therefore, the identification of appropriate antiviral treatments that could inhibit or relief the effects of the human response to the infection is of fundamental importance for fighting COVID19 and similar possible diseases determined by Coronaviridae.
